DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to identify whether an all breast milk (BM) diet would improve outcomes in neonates with congenital gastrointestinal disorders (CGD) by facilitating an earlier transition off of parenteral nutrition (PN).
DOC.brief_title: Breast Milk and Congenital Gastrointestinal Disorders
DOC.criteria: Neonates admitted to the Egleston Neonatal intensive care unit (NICU) who have never been fed Congenital gastrointestinal abnormalities such as gastroschisis, bowel atresias, malrotation, omphalocele, or meconium ileus Previous feeding
